values: Okay, my journal is shifting, im making it friends only. Everybody add me ... I won't delete this journal, sentimental purposes and whatnot. *pats journal* you's been good to me. Baii

I feel bad about me being such an idiot. I did it again... agaaaaaain! *slaps forehead*. I was going so well too. I thought i was so over it and everything. On another note i spoke to brodie the other night *raises eyebrows* i called Nessa and ended up with him on the other end. Yus.
I fiiiiiiinally got my music override working, it will take a while to load the song 1-2 minutes on my connection, but it is worth it yaaaaaayyy
Ok, after searching the net for 2 hours, i have found 1 picture. It is of 2002's Quidam so she looks a bit younger, and the costume isnt as cool

*yawns* i had to start work early today, coz i gotta go out again tonight. I tell ya, im really looking forward to having a sleep in tomorrow morning.

Oh, sam and i went and spoke to Larry at Tafe yesterday and asked if we could somehow be put upto the Cert 3 class coz this one was bullshit... And there is no way, so we have to wait out the 3 weeks. It's fun though, we just CS the whole time.

Ummm... on another note, i miss Rat and Jenn... without Rat i have no one to play games with, or talk to for that matter. And Jenn, my friends page looks so lonely without you:(.

Yus. Virgin radio is fucking crap, hurry up Living End.

Gotta go, im supposed to be 'in the toilet', haha.

Ciaoo

XxX

I wanted to post this because it is exactly how i am feeling, how i am thinking, and what is happening. Oh and don't worry about it babe :).


The hand of my clock strikes two
In times when I got the best of you
We made promises we couldn't keep
And every night we couldn't sleep.
I didn't know why, but didn't ask questions
because it was the first time in my life, yeah the first time in my life
Where I, did something right.

I set myself up for the greatest fall of all time
I set myself up for the greatest fall of all time

You pick me apart
While I search for witty things to say (In my defense)
"You'll never amount to anything anyway"
(Don't press your luck, don't press your luck)
And think that I'm impressed with your one night stands
and your contagious kiss
I'm trying to get this right
Yeah, cause I'm ridiculous like that

I set myself up for the greatest fall of all time
I set myself up for the greatest fall of all time

I'll keep this as
A constant reminder
Of the nights I spent holding onto her
And rest assured I'm moving on
I miss you less, with each day you're gone
YOU'RE GONE!

I set myself up for the greatest fall of all time
I set myself up for the greatest fall of all time
I set myself up for the greatest fall of all time

Hooray for my renewed social life. Went out last night (;))... got back this morning juuust intime for tafe. Finished tafe at 12 and i was at the train station when mum called and told me she couldn't pick me up. So i messaged someone... well jess, until i realised that i had sent it to her and apologised and sent it to the right person 8-).

Had no net yesterday, and it really didnt bother me, yus.

And Jenn... you's in trouble!:@.

Ciaoo

EDIT: Okay i put this under a cut so that everyone doesnt have to see my ramblings when they are going down their friends page. Just as everything was starting to get better. I hate my father. I FUCKING HATE HIM!. I WANT HIM TO FUCKING DIE!!. WHY DID HE DO THIS TO ME!. God. I was starting to get better. No more crying fits. No more throwing up. No more cutting. And all of a sudden im falling apart again, worse than ever. I hate this, i hate being like this. I have never felt as good as i did yesterday. Never. And now this. I wish i could tell him. I wish i could tell him what everything had been doing to me upto the other day. Tell him what he brought back worse than ever. Suddenly, I'm not half the man i used to be I hate you. I hate you so much. Just get out of Zak's life and leave him to get better. He can't get better while you are here. JUST FUCK OFF!. Now i want to grow up, so i can control my own life. I don't care about living the best years of my life. I just want to leave this place. Leave it far behind. I want to leave all the memories. I don't want to remember anything anymore. I can't think of anything anymore. All i can think about is leaving this place. I can feel it devouring my mind. Engulfing my body. I can't see anything but it. Yesterday. I want to stop it.

Well i finally got the answer out of her, it came as somewhat of a relief, means i don't have to worry about it anymore. Though it took ages to get the answer out of her. It happened.

And on another note, Hooray for Raebo coming back from Sydney already... I have a social life again. Concert on Sunday *dances* Kaaaaaaarnivooooool... and then again on october the 9th *dances* the living end agaaaaaaaaaaaaaain!.

<lj-cut text="I believe in yesterday">

Yesterday all my troubles seemed so far away.
Now it looks as though they're here to stay.
Oh, I believe in yesterday.

Suddenly, I'm not half the man I used to be
There's a shadow hanging over me.
Oh, yesterday came suddenly.

Why she had to go, I don't know,
She wouldn't say.
I said something wrong,
Now I long for yesterday.

Yesterday love was such an easy game to play.
Now I need a place to hide away.
Oh, I believe in yesterday.
Why she had to go, I don't know,
She wouldn't say.

I said something wrong,
Now I long for yesterday.
Yesterday love was such an easy game to play.
Now I need a place to hide away.
Oh, I believe in yesterday.

</lj-cut>

Yay, another KH colourbar, a nice simple one. Kairi and Sora are teh forever love. I think im slowly getting better. Or do i hope im slowly getting better. I dunno, it is a hard thing to differentiate between. But hopefully it is both. TAFE is so easy and boring, sam and i spent the whole time playing Harry Potter 8-). Zak wants to keel it! *stab stab*. On another note, i want to make icons of Doctor Who. Because his face is so perty, and it amazes me beyond my limits of amazement. Yus. That was fun. Hahaaaaaaa. No Zak crying about stuff and feeling sorry for himself today:D.

You know what?. I hate growing up, growing up sucks it big time. I just want to go back to about a year ago and stay there for the rest of my life. Am i weird?, i mean everyone is always talking about how much they want to grow up so they can go out clubbing and drinking. That just doesn't appeal to me. I don't see myself in 3 years going out and clubbing, getting pissed, getting raped or killed. I don't want to be like that. I think the thing that repels me the most is that, growing up ultimately, people start caring what they say. Caring even more about what they wear and look like. I don't care in the slightest if i talk for hours to someone about nothing, it isn't like any of us have anything better to do yeah?. But as you get older you find things that you have to do, things like clean your house, care for a baby, take your kids to school and stuff. Then you start caring if you spend hours talking to someone about nothing. I treasure the time i spend at this age, i don't want to ruin it worrying that i have to watch what a say around certain people incase it freaks them out, makes them feel i am getting to close to them. I just want to do my own thing, as we should be able to do at this age. I've got a plan Lets take off in the blue station wagon And find the open road to salvation Away from here Yeah i got a plan ???? Not trying to be something that i'm not That im not I got another plan This time it'll work Yeah i got another plan This time it will work Or ill be struck down Struck down Yeah i got a plan I could start thinking more about you I got another plan This time it'll work I got another plan this time it'll work Or ill be struck down Struck down It's not worth you wasting away Coz you say one thing in darkness And another when it's light And you end it without ruling For the best part of three days I got a plan How about we fly across the valleys at sundown Then drink more whiskey til the sun it comes back up again ??? Doesn't mean that they're half bad But they're bad I got another plan This time it'll work I got another plan This time it'll work Or ill be struck down Struck down I got another plan This time it'll work I got another plan This time it'll work Or ill be struck down Struck down [EDIT:] GOD FUCKING DAMMIT VANESSA!, I DIDN'T FUCKING KNOW YOU WERE ARGUING WITH YOUR BOYFRIEND, WHY DID YOU HAVE TO TAKE IT OUT ON ME!?, AS SOON AS I FOUND OUT YOU WERE I APOLOGISED. I WAS JUST FUCKING TALKING TO YOU!. Why does everyone do this to me?, and then they wonder why i am like i am?. It starts exactly like this, and then it ends up with me losing another friend that i didnt want to lose, with the exception of 1. *sigh* I'm really worried about you Nessa. And not talking to anyone won't help.

OH OH OH!!! GREATEST HP LAYOUT EVAAAAAR! Draco and Harry... veeeery kinkeh;). Okay since i am so bored, all the time, every month/week or so (whenever i can be bothered) i am going to put a random persons name at the top of each entry... and a picture i spose. It might be someone you know personally, it might be a celebrity, an anime character, or even someone you don't know. And you hafta think up the most imaginative place you could/would get naughty with this character, what you would say tp them, and a few other things... So even if it is a guy and you are a guy, or vice versa, don't worry about it, im sure no one is going to make fun of you on this journal, and if they do, ill schmack them. Either way, the most creative answer, will win... ummm well i havent decided yet, we shall just start with a pat on the back from me, and a laugh from everyone else:P, and then later i think that i will let you have a claim on that person/character/celeb etc. only if you want it (you can claim more than 1 person/character/celeb). If you don't the second person will, and so on and so forth for aslong as i can be bothered. Which reminds me. The Form - Your Name (doesn't have to be your real name)?: First thing you would say to them?: What would you call them?: Place you would/could get naughty with them?: [IF, you are the most creative, would you like to claim them?: (not included at the moment)] First Person Of The Week/Month is: Ewan McGregor (Sexy, Scottish Luff)

Damn, my addiction to Crowded House is back again! *pout*, now i won't be able to listen to anything else for months.

Especially this song, which used to be happy, but now makes me cry.

omewhere deep inside
Something's got a hold on you
And it's pushing me aside
See it stretch on forever

I know I'm right

That's why I tell you
You'd better be home soon

Of lies and deception
Back to nothingness
Like a week in the desert

I know I'm right
For the first time in my life
That's why I tell you
You'd better be home soon

So don't say no
Don't say nothing's wrong
Cos when you get back home
Maybe I'll be gone

It would cause me pain
If we were to end it
But I could start again
You can depend on it

I know I'm right
For the first time in my life
That's why I tell you
You'd better be home soon
That's why I tell you
You'd better be home soon

Yus, busy day. The bonus draw was on today. I hate Bonus Draw's!. *stab stab stab*. Yus. And Keith didn't help, he came in and bought $213.60 worth of lotto and scratchies, and paid for it all in silver coins!!!, in the middle of a packed shop!, fucker!, i have never seen a bag so big. Anyway, i made my first colourbar just then XD *is proud* Kingdom Hearts II is teh unknown sex
YAARRR!, just read Jenn's post, and i want to kill popular people that make other people unhappy, just because they are different!!, DAMN THEM!!. Go Jenn, don't let them change you! EVER!.

Keeping this safe for when they add me back.

Yes. Resident n00b reporting for duty.

Name and age: Zak, 16
I want to be voted as a (Pick one: boy/girl/doesn't matter): hehe, im not gonna say incase it tips the odds:P
Favorite KH character and why: Riku all the way, baby. I am not gay btw *cynical look*
Favorite Disney movie and why: Mulan!.

Strengths: Im optimistic, Smart, HA!, Sexy, Blonde... haha is this guy up himself or what?:P, but seriously, i am optimistic and... smart, that's it:P
Weaknesses: Lazy, I Procrastinate like crazy
Hobbies, interests: Anime, KH, FFVII, FFVIII, FFIX, FFX, FFX-2, and obsessing over the release of KHII. Oh and music and graphic design.
Something unique about you: ummm, i ignore people being sexist and homophobic, but i would never do it myself. Respect. If that is unique?:P
Your ideal home?: In one of the FF games, that would be heaven....... I'll say.
What type of people are your friends?: Friends?, oh those, ummm yeah, they are friendly, and nice... among other things...

Sword, staff or the shield?: Sword, baby
What's most important to you: Love..
Worst fears: Rejection, Broken Heart
What you want out of life: Finish TAFE (college) and get a job doing graphic design
You share your paopu fruit with (be creative!): The Beast of Honor!!!

Appearance (photos are optional): I look terrible in photo's... but, blonde, short hair, messy, blue eyes, medium bordering tallness height, shoe size 12, shorts size 32 (really really baggy and loose:P), pants size 38 (see before), no glasses... ummm, jaa, anything else?
How do you think you would look if you were a KH character?: Tidus *shudder*

Who suggested that you come here?:  

Yes, well that was fun, happy rating XD

*kills self for being such an utter and total dick AGAIN* 

BANG!, SPLOOSH!, THUMP!, SCREAM!.

Well i thought it was a pretty accurate estimate... considering i have never killed myself before.

Why do i get myself in these things, im not supposed to be interested in things anymore because when i do i find it always revolves around him. Sheeesh. 

STAB!, SLOOSH!, GASP!, THUMP!, SCREAM!.

Yes... thaaaaaaaaat's fun... anyway, forgot what i was saying inbetween all that dying... oh yes. Nope i said it all. Off the drugs Zak.

On a completely different note, Zak has now tried to beat Ansem, 202 times, with no success. Excuse me while i go try again.

Bye.

Fuck, i found out just then that that girl at tafe i like, she is 19 and has a boyfriend...

Fuck, now i gotta go back to being psycho again *rolls eyes*.

Fuckfuckfuckfuckfuckfuckfuckfuckfuckfuckfuckfuck.fuck.

Baii

Everything reminds me of you. Utter Silence A fragmented tale A world without you The eyes will close Something so simple Something so natural The memory beyond Her voice...It's left me. This time...I'll fight We'll go together II Kingdom Hearts He looks just like you. Everything is coming back to me, the true... Everything reminds me of you. I am going crazy. Insane. I need something to preoccupy myself. I want Kingdom Hearts II already dammit! :(. And i still need to beat Ansem in KH. I can't do it, i have a tally of the amount of times i have tried. it now numbers 128, add a couple on for the few i did beforehand. I can't goddamn beat him, and levelling up is so long and boring. Everyone says, just get to level 60 and then try. But i am the master of passing games with low levels, i did Final Fantasy IX and i was only level 38, when everyone was saying you should be at least level 60. It is so frustrating to go and try to beat him and fail miserably 128+ times. I'm not used to losing :(. I hate losing!. You told me you loved me, Why did you leave me, All alone All Alone... Nobody Who is Nobody, you ask? They are the nonexistence ones. What took you so long. Can we do it again. You are the source of all Heartless. !!This is the world in its true form.!! [EDIT]:I want to draw... well mine, more than your. Attention to something i said in a post a few days ago. 'Ummm yes, i did something last night i promised myself i wouldn't, and ultimately i shouldn't have, because you will stop talking to me again, and it will happen all over again.' Put those words together: I did something I shouldn't have You Stop talking to me again It Happen all over again Make a few minor changes. Put them all together: 'I did something, i shouldn't have. You, stopped talking to me again. It happened all over again.' This stupid fuck.

What a nightmare, this layout was a bugger to install. I did it in the end but XD. What was i going to say?... I forgot again! Maybe lyrics will make me remember You won't cry for my absence i know You forgot me long ago Am i that unimportant? Am i so insignificant? Isn't something missing? Isn't someone missing me? Hmmm. Well TAFE is shit easy, im serious. I could shit harder things than TAFE. I've decided that im not going to go tuesday afternoons, or mondays. So that means i hafta go Tuesday 9-12, Thursday 1-4 and Friday 9-12. That sound's better. Still havent remembered what i was going to say. I do remember i was going to mention the fact that im scared. I can't say why. Im just scared again, and it has only been a week. Im getting worse at this. Fuck it, seeya later guys, im going on tour with Linkin Park. TTFN.

Okay, it's been a while sinve i updated. Mainly because i have had other things on my mind.

Rock Eisteddfod on thursday night. Everyone did really good. Jess and Rat, coz you guys are the only people who did the Rock Eisteddfod, and read my journal. Well done guys:D. We got through to the final!!, August the 20th?... or something around then.

I was playing footy afterwards while we were waiting for the rewards to be handed out. And i stepped sideways on my foot, and totally fucked it. The same way i did to my other foot 2 years ago. I don't think it is broken this time but. I can't walk on it, and it only hurts if i try to put it in a shoe.

Ummm what else. Yeah the fight with Nell. Im actually glad it happened, as cruel as it sounds. I really didn't want to talk to her anymore. Emily is pissed at me now, coz i got pissed at her coz she told me to go back to pining over Jess. Apparently she didn't mean it how i took it.

*sigh* I want someone to read Harry Potter so i can discuss the whole thing with them... someone?.

Work sucks, i have no motivation to work or aaanything except play WoW with Rupert. Stupid game. I hate it. It keeps forcing me to make friends. I met a girl from Hawaii on it the other day her name is Lanna. What a cool name huh?. I want it. It sounds so anime. Ummm yeah, she is cool.

What else. I have to go to this stupid quiz night thing tonight, i don't wanna go. Someone better talk to me while i am there. Table of 8 people!!!!, i can hardly stand being around my family, let alone 2 other families.

Ummm yes, i did something last night i promised myself i wouldn't, and ultimately i shouldn't have, because you will stop talking to me again, and it will happen all over again.

And i wanna play FFIX again. But i only have the first 2 discs which i downloaded, and couldnt get the second 2.

Going now.

Ciaoo

EDIT: Pepper Squid Ffor lunch today from Hans. There is no pepper in it, don't be silly! st00pid lying people. It is extremely sweet. *thinks quietly to self* i wonder if pepper is japanese for honey.

You know what. I want this damn lady out of our house. She turned up about 2 weeks ago, because she had left her boyfriend. Mum and her are really good friends, which is the reason she is welcome. But when she starts ordering us around, and telling us (i.e Meika and I) to do things. Like today she said to me that mum had said it was alright for her to move into my room for a few weeks. I was like ':O!! NO! GET YOUR OWN FUCKING ROOM!'. My room is the only place that i can escape from my family. Which is why i spend so much time down here. Then later on, Meika was watching Red Dwarf, and i was reading and half watching. She walks in and says 'Turn it onto Lost', and i said 'No, we are watching Red Dwarf, we'll tape it and you can watch it later'. She then demanded that she be allowed to watch lost because it is the only show on tv she watchs, (apart from black books, spicks and specks, the bill and Home and Away, of course... or did she forget to mention those. She also has the nerve to complain about how loud it is in the house is stressing her out. She doesnt have to fucking be in here. If it is so hard to live with, why doesnt she fucking go somewhere else. I think she has extended her stay for a little too long. Stupid bitch. I wish i could forget your name Your face, your smile, your sweet embrace You're making it hard for me The days seem long The nights seem cold Ciaoo

Courtney, get online now, we have some serious bonding to do, we arent so different anymore man. God i love this song so much. I woke up early this morning around 4am With the moon shining bright as headlights on the interstate I pulled the covers over my head and tried to catch some sleep But thoughts of us kept keeping me awake Ever since you found yourself in someone else's arms I've been tryin' my best to get along But that's OK There's nothing left to say, but Take your records, take your freedom Take your memories I don't need'em Take your space and take your reasons But you'll think of me And take your cat and leave my sweater 'Cause we have nothing left to weather In fact I'll feel a whole lot better But you'll think of me, you'll think of me I went out driving trying to clear my head I tried to sweep out all the ruins that my emotions left I guess I'm feeling just a little tired of this And all the baggage that seems to still exist It seems the only blessing I have left to my name Is not knowing what we could have been What we should have been So Take your records, take your freedom Take your memories I don't need'em Take your space and take your reasons But you'll think of me And take your cat and leave my sweater 'Cause we have nothing left to weather In fact I'll feel a whole lot better But you'll think of me Someday I'm gonna run across your mind Don't worry, I'll be fine I'm gonna be alright While you're sleeping with your pride Wishing I could hold you tight I'll be over you And on with my life So take your records, take your freedom Take your memories I don't need'em And take your cat and leave my sweater 'Cause we have nothing left to weather In fact I'll feel a whole lot better But you'll think of me So take your records, take your freedom Take your memories I don't need'em Take your space and all your reasons But you'll think of me And take your cat and leave my sweater 'Cause we got nothing left to weather In fact I'll feel a whole lot better But you'll think of me, you'll think of me, yeah And you're gonna think of me Oh someday baby, someday
